titleStmt.title: [Apographē storgēs], or, A description of the passion of love demonstrating its original, causes, effects, signes, and remedies / by Will. Greenwood, [Philalethēs].
titleStmt.author: Greenwood, Will.

notesStmt.note: Bracketed words printed in Greek letters.
Imperfect: print show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
